meanings.definition: A long, flat piece of sawn timber.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used boards to build the new bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The boards were stacked neatly in the lumberyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loves to scratch the boards of the old wooden table.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumble of thoughts, like a stack of boards waiting to be sorted.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the saw cutting through the boards echoed in the workshop.

meanings.definition: A group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization.
meanings.sent1: The boards of directors meet every month to discuss company strategy.
meanings.sent2: She was elected to the school board last year.
meanings.sent3: The boards of the club decided to host a charity event.
meanings.sent4: The boards of the ship guided it safely through the stormy seas.
meanings.sent5: The boards of the chess game were carefully arranged on the table.

meanings.definition: A flat, thin, rectangular piece of stiff material used for various purposes.

meanings.sent2: The notice board was filled with upcoming events.
meanings.sent3: The cutting board slipped on the wet kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: His skateboard became his trusty companion on the streets.
meanings.sent5: The ironing board stood against the wall, waiting to be used.
